section.p: is distributed in the installation package. It contains archive files with the software and documentation for installing and configuring .
The CMM_server_2.0.x.zip file includes (replace x with the current version number of ):

li.p: CMM_server_2.0.x_images.tar. Tarred archive file with the Docker images required for installing and configuring .
docker-compose-Linux-x86_64_1.15.0. Docker Compose binary required to install .
docker-compose-metric.yml and docker-compose-log.yml. Docker Compose YAML files required for installing and configuring .
.env. Docker Compose environment file defining the default environment variables used by Docker Compose.
monasca-agent-CMM_2.0.x.run. Executable for installing a Metrics Agent on an OpenStack node.
log-agent-CMM_2.0.x.run. Executable for installing a Log Agent on an OpenStack node.
monasca-ui-CMM_2.0.x.run. Executable for installing the Horizon Plugin on the node where the OpenStack Horizon Service is deployed.

section.p: The CMM_documentation.zip file includes PDF manuals providing an overview of as well as information directed to system operators and application operators.
